00108 inline void DHough::getLinePointsDouble(int w, int h, double R, double Theta,
00109           bool fThetaInDegrees,
00110           double *x0, double *y0,
00111           double *x1, double *y1){
00112   double thetaRad;
00113   double m;
00114   double b; // y-position where line crosses x=0
00115   double c; // y-pos where line crosses x=w-1
00116   double d; // x-pos where line crosses y=0
00117   double e; // x-pos where line crosses y=h-1
00118 
00119   (*x0) = -1;
00120   (*y0) = -1;
00121   (*x1) = -1;
00122   (*y1) = -1;
00123 
00124   if(fThetaInDegrees){ // degrees
00125     thetaRad = DMath::degreesToRadians(Theta);
00126   }
00127   else{ // radians
00128     thetaRad = Theta;
00129   }
00130   if((Theta < (-50 * M_PI)) || (Theta >= (50 * M_PI))){
00131     fprintf(stderr, "DHough::getLinePointsDouble() Theta=%f should be in "
00132       "range [0..2PI)\n", Theta);
00133     abort();
00134   }
00135   while(Theta < 0.){
00136     Theta += 2*M_PI;
00137   }
00138   while(Theta > 2*M_PI){
00139     Theta -= 2*M_PI;
00140   }
00141   if( (fabs(thetaRad) < 0.00001) ||
00142       (fabs(M_PI - thetaRad) < 0.00001) ||
00143       (fabs(2*M_PI - thetaRad) < 0.00001)){
00144     (*x0) = 0;
00145     (*y0) = R;
00146     (*x1) = w-1;
00147     (*y1) = (*y0);
00148     return;
00149   }
00150   if( (fabs(M_PI_2 - thetaRad) < 0.00001) ||
00151       (fabs(M_PI+M_PI_2 - thetaRad) < 0.00001) ){
00152     (*x0) = R;
00153     (*y0) = 0;
00154     (*x1) = (*x0);
00155     (*y1) = h-1;
00156     return;
00157   }
00158 
00159   //  m = -1. / tan(thetaRad);
00160 //   b = R / sin(thetaRad);
00161   m = -1. * tan(thetaRad);
00162   b = R / sin(M_PI_2 -thetaRad);
00163   c = m * (w-1) + b;
00164   d = (0-b) / m;
00165   e = ( (h-1) - b) / m;
00166 
00167   printf("m=%.2f b=%.1f c=%.1f d=%.1f e=%.1f thetaRad=%.1f(%.1fdeg) "
00168    "w=%d h=%d R=%.1f\n\n",m,b,c,d,e,thetaRad,
00169    DMath::radiansToDegrees(thetaRad), w, h, R);
00170   if( (b>= 0.) && (b <= (h-1))){
00171     (*x0) = 0;
00172     (*y0) = b;
00173     if( (c>= 0.) && (c <= (h-1))){
00174       (*x1) = w-1;
00175       (*y1) = c;
00176       return;
00177     }
00178     if( (d >= 0.) && (d <= (w-1))){
00179       (*x1) = d;
00180       (*y1) = 0;
00181       return;
00182     }
00183     (*x1) = e;
00184     (*y1) = h-1;
00185     return;
00186   }
00187   if( b < 0.){
00188     if( (d >=0) && (d <= (w-1))){
00189       (*x0) = d;
00190       (*y0) = 0;
00191       if( (e >=0) && (e <= (w-1))){
00192   (*x1) = e;
00193   (*y1) = h-1;
00194   return;
00195       }
00196       (*x1) = w-1;
00197       (*y1) = c;
00198       return;
00199     }
00200     return; // all -1
00201   }
00202   if( b > (h-1) ){
00203     if( (e >=0) && (e <= (w-1))){
00204       (*x0) = e;
00205       (*y0) = h-1;
00206       if( (d >=0) && (d <= (w-1))){
00207   (*x1) = d;
00208   (*y1) = 0;
00209   return;
00210       }
00211       (*x1) = w-1;
00212       (*y1) = c;
00213       return;
00214     }
00215     return; // all -1
00216   }
00217   printf("huh?\n");
00218   abort();
00219   return;
00220 }

00223 inline void DHough::getLinePointsDouble(DImage &imgAccum,
00224           double R, double Theta,
00225           bool fThetaInDegrees,
00226           double *x0, double *y0,
